mapper.insert: insert into gm_group (openid, group_name,status, created_date, modified_date) values (#{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'0', now(), now())
mapper.select: select g.id, g.openid, g.group_name, g.status,g.created_date, g.modified_date from gm_group g left join gm_group_member gm on g.id = gm.group_id where gm.openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and g.status = '0' and gm.status = '0' order by g.created_date asc
mapper.update: update gm_group set group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete: update gm_group set status = '1' where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
